topic.title: STOP SMOKING SUCCESSFULLY QUIT CARBON MONOXIDE VALIDATION TOTAL (PREGNANT WOMEN)
topic.shortdesc: STOP SMOKING SUCCESSFULLY QUIT CARBON MONOXIDE VALIDATION TOTAL (PREGNANT WOMEN) is the number of pregnant women in the REPORTING PERIOD with:a Person Stop Smoking Episode anda NON SMOKING CONFIRMATION STATUS INDICATOR AT 4 WEEKS of National Code 'Yes - non-smoking status confirmed by carbon monoxide validation'.
